OUTLINE : This multicenter study . Patients undergo external beam radiotherapy ( EBRT ) daily 5 day week 5 week . On 1 day week , patient also receive cisplatin IV 3 hour hyperthermia 90 minute begin 1-6 hour completion EBRT .
